text:
e="preserve">The Arab Cup of Nations (Arabic: ‎‎ "Kaʾs al-ʾUmam al-ʿArabiyya") is a association football tournament held between the Arab countries. Iraq has been the most successful team, winning 4 tournaments.
Morocco won the most recent tournament, which occurred in 2012.
The first tournament was played in Lebanon in 1963.
